Upper limb apraxia comprises wide spectrum high motor disorder cause acquire brain disease , affect performance skilled movement carry upper limb . DOC.criteria: Mildmoderate stroke two month cerebrovascular attack . Upper limb apraxia last least 2 month . Less 9 point validate Apraxia Screen TULIA ( AST ) follow Vanbellingen et al. , 2010 . Voluntary participation . The neurologist , occupational therapist patient judge intervention necessary . History apraxia current stroke . Stroke occur less two month twenty four month ago . Cognitive impairment ( < 23 normal school population < 20 point low education illiteracy , Spanish validation MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) ) . Severe aphasia . Previous brain tumour . History previous neurologic disorder . Mother tongue different Spanish . Drugs addiction . Intellectual learning disorder . Brain damage traumatism neurodegenerative process . A history serious consciousness impairment Uncooperativeness , presence orthopedic disable disorder .
